tns:patch.author: denismbugua
tns:patch.description: Add AMP Dashboard api endpoint to send funding data to dashboard

script.lang: INSERT INTO public.amp_global_settings (id, settingsname, settingsvalue, possiblevalues, description, section, value_translatable) VALUES (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'AMP Dashboard URL', 'https://ggw-dashboard.dgstg.org/api/amp-funding/importDonorFunding', null, 'Amp Dashboard api url', 'general', null);
